analysis module¶

This Analysis class calculates inflation rate of based on the preprocessed data, and also analyzes all products inflation rate of a country.

class analysis.Analyser¶

Bases: preprocessor.Preprocessor

Class Analyser calculates inflation rate and analyzes all products inflation rate of a country.

all_products_inflation(nation: str, start_time: str, stop_time: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

This function merge all products inflation rate of a given country for specific period of time, provided by the user.

nationstring

The name of the country

startstring

The initial month or the reference month.

stopstring

The last month of the time.

resultframe : dataframe Returns a dataframe of all products for a given period of time and country.

inflation_calculator(input_df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

This function calculates inflation rate of a given dataframe.

input_dfpandas DataFrame

well formulated dataframe result of other functions ready to be analysed.

inflation_resultdataframe

returns calculated inflation rate

set_datafile(product: str, country_list: list, start_time: str, stop_time: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Data setter for the Analyzer class.

productstr

A list of products.

country_listlist

A list of countries.

start_timestr

The first month or reference date to calculate inflation rate.

stop_timestr

The last month of the date range.

TYPE

Return a dataframe.

analysis.main(args)¶

The main entry function from command line interface.

argsTYPE

Accepts arguments product,country list, period of time from command line.

None.

global inflation analyser
